means: 医生，大夫( doctor的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Doctors are complaining about being barraged by drug-company salesmen.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生们抱怨他们疲于应付医药公司的销售人员。

sentence.Network_en: I have had very little help from doctors and no sympathy whatsoever.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从医生那里没有得到什么帮助，也未获得丝毫同情。

sentence.Network_en: The doctors gave numerous examples of patients being expelled from hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生们列举了大量病人被逐出医院的实例。

in the ambulance , the doctors injected cold saline salt water , into his blood system . this brought his body temperature down to about 33 degrees Celsius , about 4 degrees below normal .在救护车内，医生就向他的血管系统内注射冷盐水，这将他的体温降至约33℃（低下正常体温4℃左右)。
so , as long as the slanting dens can correct , as long as the dens root can make use of , the doctors will as far as possible reserve a natural tooth .所以，只要歪牙能够矫正，只要牙根能够利用，医生都会尽量保留天然牙齿。
he was greatly respected by his brother doctors .与他共事的医生对他非常尊敬。

entry.def: A doctor is someone who is qualified in medicine and treats people who are ill.

example.ex: Do not discontinue the treatment without consulting your doctor...
example.tran: 未经医嘱不要擅自中断治疗。

example.ex: Doctor Paige will be here right after lunch to see her.
example.tran: 佩奇医生一吃完午饭就会来这儿看她。

entry.def: A dentist or veterinarian can also be called doctor .
The doctor's is used to refer to the surgery or office where a doctor works.

example.ex: I have an appointment at the doctors.

entry.def: A doctor is someone who has been awarded the highest academic or honorary degree by a university.

example.ex: He is a doctor of philosophy.

entry.def: If someone doctors something, they change it in order to deceive people.

example.ex: They doctored the prints to make her look as awful as possible.
example.tran: 他们修改了照片，尽可能地丑化她的容貌。

entry.tran: (将毒药、麻药等)掺入(食物或饮料中)
entry.def: If someone doctors food or drink, they add a poison or drug to it.

example.ex: She had no doubt that it was he who had doctored her milk.
example.tran: 她毫不怀疑是他在她的牛奶里下了药。

Sentence.sentence: Few doctors would have thought that there might be an exception to this.
Al Herpin was 90 years old when doctors came to his home in New Jersy
His doctors were puzzled by the strange case of permanent sleeplessness.
At first, the doctors weren't sure, but she's really improved.
After last week's announcement that Phil Collins might give up touring because live concerts are ruining his voice, doctors are counseling stars about the dos and don'ts of voice care
He has been seeing doctors and counsellors.
